nodes.text: Star Wars: Anakin's Speedway was a game released by Lucas Learning in 2000. It was intended for children ages 4 and up and featured young Anakin Skywalker and other characters from Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace.

Anakin's Speedway challenges kids to construct and master podracing test tracks with their favorite Episode I characters such as Anakin, Sebulba, and Gasgano. Players could create thousands of tracks filled with turns, loops, jumps, and tunnels while learning the dynamics of speed and momentum.
